Banner.Description: Iâ€™m a Full Stack Developer with hands-on experience in ASP.NET Core, Angular, Flutter, and MySQL, focused on creating scalable, responsive, and user-friendly applications. I specialize in building clean, maintainable architectures that ensure reliability and performance from front end to back end. Skilled in RESTful API development, database optimization, and agile workflows, I thrive in collaborative environments where innovation, precision, and problem-solving drive results.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: Iâ€™m a Full Stack Software Developer with hands-on experience building scalable, responsive, and cross-platform applications using Angular, Flutter, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, .NET Core, Java, and MySQL. I excel at transforming complex requirements into clean, maintainable architectures that deliver high performance and seamless user experiences. Beyond coding, I focus on optimizing systems, standardizing development patterns, and proposing innovative solutions that add real value to projects. I thrive in collaborative, fast-paced environments where creativity, precision, and problem-solving drive results. Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Software Developer
Description: Develop and maintain scalable full-stack web applications using Angular (frontend) and .NET Core with MySQL (backend), ensuring high performance, security, and responsive design across all devices.
Design and implement RESTful APIs, integrating them seamlessly with Angular components to enable dynamic, data-driven functionality and enhance overall user experience.
Elevate UI/UX quality by creating reusable, modular Angular components and ensuring cross-browser compatibility and consistent responsive behavior.

Collaborate in agile teams, actively participating in sprint planning, code reviews, and daily standups to deliver high-quality features within deadlines and continuously improve development practices.
Optimize backend performance by crafting efficient MySQL queries, stored procedures, and indexes, and by diagnosing and resolving complex issues across the full application stack.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Customer Support Associate
Description: Served as a Customer Support Associate for Bajaj Finserv, managing customer interactions and guiding them through the complete loan application process.
Processed end-to-end personal loan applications, ensuring accuracy in documentation, eligibility verification, and approval coordination.
Successfully contributed to loan disbursements worth â‚¹2 Crores, supporting business growth through quality service and customer satisfaction.
Maintained high standards of compliance and data integrity, while effectively resolving customer queries and ensuring smooth loan processing.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Frontend Developer Intern
Description: Designed and implemented responsive user interfaces, improving cross-device compatibility and user experience.
Creating platforms with Angular, Nodejs, ExpressJS, WordPress programmed with functional, reactive, and object-oriented programming paradigms.
Collaborated with senior developers to translate UI/UX designs into functional web pages, following best practices in clean and maintainable code.
Gained hands-on experience in debugging, browser compatibility, and performance optimization for frontend components.

FeatureProjects.Title: Projects that I was a part of
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Hardware Data Controlling System
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: A high-performance web application built from scratch to manage multiple hardware devices with real-time data tracking. It features robust APIs for seamless IoT communication, concurrent device support, dynamic status monitoring, and interactive data visualization.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Billing System
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: A comprehensive billing system designed to streamline invoicing and payment processes. It includes features such as customer management, invoice generation, payment tracking, and reporting, all built with a user-friendly interface and secure backend.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Feedback System
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: A sophisticated feedback management platform developed from the ground up, featuring secure user authentication, fully customizable feedback forms, and configurable evaluation parameters. The system provides real-time submission tracking, advanced analytics dashboards, and automated notifications, enabling organizations to efficiently collect, monitor, and analyze user feedback for data-driven decision making.

OtherProjects.Title: More personal projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: MovieLens
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A dynamic movie app showcasing the latest releases with real-time updates. Users can explore cast, ratings, trailers, and synopses, with clear indicators for new films. The intuitive interface ensures seamless navigation for an engaging movie discovery experience.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message. Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.
